flawed_nl_solution:
She gets 1000/25=<<1000/25=40.0>>40.0 sections
She gives away 40.0/4=<<40.0/4=10.0>>10.0 sections
So she keeps 40.0-10.0=<<40.0-10.0=32.0>>32.0 sections
She keeps 32.0/2=<<32.0/2=16.0>>16.0 sections on hand

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30.0, not 32.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
